mapper.select: select `id`,`apply_major`,`gallery_name`,`atlas_number`,`design_start_end`,`approval_document_number`,`approved_document_number`,`dditor_chief`,`cooperation_unit`,`reporting_contact_person`,`reporting_contact_phone`,`accessories_catalog`,`main_content_atlas`,`main_advantages_disadvantages_benefits`,`award_received`,`reporting_unit_opinion`,`up_recommendation`,`opt_uid`,`pro_id`,`task_id`,`created`,`updated`,`deleted`, fax from ass_surver_standard_apply_table_info where id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from ass_surver_standard_apply_table_info where id in
#{id}
